pr_title: Allow insert overwrite as default behavior for Hive connector

timeline.bodyText: nit: how about saying When enabled, insertion query can overwrite existing partitions when partitions are immutable. This...
timeline.author: shixuan-fan

timeline.message:
Allows insert overwrite as default behavior for Hive connector

Hive connector users often expects INSERT OVERWRITE as the default
INSERT behavior. While there is a session property
`insert_existing_partitions_behavior` to enable this, it has to be
manually enabled.

This commit introduces a new Hive client configuration
`hive.insert-overwrite-immutable-partitions-enabled` to allow admin set
insert overwrite as the default behavior.
